paragraphs.text: Sand-sailers are used by the Sandbender Tribes.

paragraphs.body: Sand-sailers are the primary form of ${link_0} used by the ${link_1}. While not ideal for transporting large amounts of cargo or great numbers of people, the sand-sailers are agile, handle nimbly, and can traverse great expanses of desert wasteland quickly with minimal effort.
paragraphs.text: Sand-sailers are the primary form of transportation used by the Sandbender Tribes. While not ideal for transporting large amounts of cargo or great numbers of people, the sand-sailers are agile, handle nimbly, and can traverse great expanses of desert wasteland quickly with minimal effort.
Team Avatar found a sand-sailer in the Si Wong Desert.

paragraphs.body: After ${link_0} and his friends kidnapped ${link_1}, ${link_2} was forced to cross the ${link_3} on foot. While walking, ${link_4} discovered a sand-sailer when she accidentally kicked it and felt the vibrations run through it. This sailer had been buried under the sand by Appa when the ${link_5} sneezed after flurries of sand agitated his sinuses. ${link_6} quickly excavated the boat with his ${link_7} so the group could use it to traverse the desert more quickly. Instead of using sandbending to propel the sand-sailer, Aang provided a strong gust of wind to propel it.
paragraphs.text: After Ghashiun and his friends kidnapped Appa, Team Avatar was forced to cross the Si Wong Desert on foot. While walking, Toph discovered a sand-sailer when she accidentally kicked it and felt the vibrations run through it. This sailer had been buried under the sand by Appa when the bison sneezed after flurries of sand agitated his sinuses. Aang quickly excavated the boat with his airbending so the group could use it to traverse the desert more quickly. Instead of using sandbending to propel the sand-sailer, Aang provided a strong gust of wind to propel it.

paragraphs.body: When Aang later learned that Ghashiun and the other sandbenders were responsible for the kidnapping and selling of Appa, he entered the ${link_0} and destroyed the sandbenders' sand-sailers.
paragraphs.text: When Aang later learned that Ghashiun and the other sandbenders were responsible for the kidnapping and selling of Appa, he entered the Avatar State and destroyed the sandbenders' sand-sailers.

paragraphs.body: After getting stranded in the Si Wong Desert in 171 ${link_0}, ${link_1} used the metal scraps of the crashed Earth Kingdom ${link_2} to weld together a makeshift sand-sailer, powered by ${link_3}'s airbending. The two girls, along with the four-man crew of the airship, used it to evade a ${link_4} inhabiting the desert and escape toward the ${link_5}. Upon arrival, the vehicle broke down, though Asami still offered to sell it to a group of onlooking sandbenders, sitting on a traditional sand-sailer, as "slightly used".
paragraphs.text: After getting stranded in the Si Wong Desert in 171 AG, Asami Sato used the metal scraps of the crashed Earth Kingdom airship to weld together a makeshift sand-sailer, powered by Korra's airbending. The two girls, along with the four-man crew of the airship, used it to evade a sand shark inhabiting the desert and escape toward the Misty Palms Oasis. Upon arrival, the vehicle broke down, though Asami still offered to sell it to a group of onlooking sandbenders, sitting on a traditional sand-sailer, as "slightly used".

paragraphs.body: A sand-sailer compass is oriented toward the ${link_0}'s magnetic center, the ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: A sand-sailer compass is oriented toward the desert's magnetic center, the Si Wong Rock.

paragraphs.body: Sand-sailers are light crafts made of wood and equipped with runners that slide across the sand. A sail is attached in between the runners to catch the hot, wild desert winds. The sandbender pilots use their ${link_0} to help steer and propel the sailers by creating whirling columns of sand which generate wind. Naturally, an airbender can also propel the vehicle by creating gusts of wind.
paragraphs.text: Sand-sailers are light crafts made of wood and equipped with runners that slide across the sand. A sail is attached in between the runners to catch the hot, wild desert winds. The sandbender pilots use their bending to help steer and propel the sailers by creating whirling columns of sand which generate wind. Naturally, an airbender can also propel the vehicle by creating gusts of wind.

paragraphs.body: Every vehicle is equipped with a compass that is oriented toward the ${link_0}, the magnetic center of the desert. Using this focus point, the sandbenders are able to navigate through the ever shifting dunes of the desert.
paragraphs.text: Every vehicle is equipped with a compass that is oriented toward the Si Wong Rock, the magnetic center of the desert. Using this focus point, the sandbenders are able to navigate through the ever shifting dunes of the desert.
